name: Opera Developer News - 300 million users and move to WebKit
caption: my.opera.com
description: On the same day as announcing that Opera has 300 million users, we're also announcing that for all new products Opera will use WebKit as its rendering engine and V8 as its JavaScript engine. It's built using the open-source Chromium browser as one of its components. Of course, a browser is much more...

data.message: That's awesome! now people can use Opera :D Hopefully IE can do the same thing!
